payload.content: The common narrative that "vibe coding" will replace enterprise SaaS due to disposable software is incorrect; the reality is more complex.

name: The common narrative that "vibe coding" will replace enterprise SaaS due to disp
content: The common narrative that "vibe coding" will replace enterprise SaaS due to disposable software is incorrect; the reality is more complex.

payload.content: Software cost has significantly decreased, but the cost of human attention has not.

name: Software cost has significantly decreased, but the cost of human attention has n
content: Software cost has significantly decreased, but the cost of human attention has not.

payload.content: Cursor's philosophy of rapid iteration and frequent shipping works for developers who tolerate variance, but it is unsuitable for CIOs and enterprise customers who prioritize reliability.

name: Cursor's philosophy of rapid iteration and frequent shipping works for developer
content: Cursor's philosophy of rapid iteration and frequent shipping works for developers who tolerate variance, but it is unsuitable for CIOs and enterprise customers who prioritize reliability.

payload.content: Proactive AI is distinct from merely bolting on a chatbot; it involves creating value customers didn't know they were missing.

name: Proactive AI is distinct from merely bolting on a chatbot; it involves creating
content: Proactive AI is distinct from merely bolting on a chatbot; it involves creating value customers didn't know they were missing.

payload.content: The majority (95%) of the market requires a different AI strategy than what is commonly discussed.

name: The majority (95%) of the market requires a different AI strategy than what is c
content: The majority (95%) of the market requires a different AI strategy than what is commonly discussed.

payload.content: The difference between companies like Cursor (shipping multiple times a day) and Salesforce (prioritizing reliability) is a fundamental distinction in customer value proposition, not a temporary gap.

name: The difference between companies like Cursor (shipping multiple times a day) and
content: The difference between companies like Cursor (shipping multiple times a day) and Salesforce (prioritizing reliability) is a fundamental distinction in customer value proposition, not a temporary gap.

payload.content: For enterprise builders, the strategic opportunity lies in earning the right to deploy proactive AI that generates previously unrecognized value for customers, rather than emulating rapid shipping models like Cursor.

name: For enterprise builders, the strategic opportunity lies in earning the right to
content: For enterprise builders, the strategic opportunity lies in earning the right to deploy proactive AI that generates previously unrecognized value for customers, rather than emulating rapid shipping models like Cursor.
